name: Blood Bowl
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

The game of fantasy football. Based on the famous Warhammer Fantasy world and American Football, Blood Bowl is a combination of a strategy game and a sports game. It's an incredible turn-based tactical game in which you lead your team through a bone crunching league to become the Blood Bowl Champions! Create and manage your team and allow it to gain experience through the many tournaments taking place in the Old World.
  • Create and develop your own team
  • 8 playable races available: Humans, Orcs, Dwarfs, Wood Elves, Lizardmen, Skaven, Goblins and Chaos.
  • A great solo mode: Single games, Championships, Cups, and a Grand Slam.
  • Challenge your friends in multiplayer using the Hotseat mode or the Wireless DS Multi-Card!
